wikipedia_page.main: Allan Claud Jephcott (31 October 1890 – 5 October 1950) was an English professional footballer who played as an outside right.

response: The film was based on a play "Shooting Star" by Basil Thomas which premiered in 1949.shooting Star at National Archives Thomas was a football fan who decided to write a play about the transfer system. He says managers and directors were keen to co operate. Among the people Thomas interviewed were Ted Vizard, Stan Cullis and Claude Jephcott.
* Claude Jephcott, English professional footballer, played in the 1912 FA Cup Final
